I hope my monstrous appearance doesn't come as too much of a shock.$8"/pause 250/emote Mateo 56/pause 250/speak Mateo "{{MateoSenMonsterResponse}}"/pause 250/speak SenS "Oh, certainly not! I'm not one to attack unless it's in self defense..."/pause 250/emote Mateo 40/pause 250/speak Mateo "So what brings you out into the rain, buddy?$77"/pause 250/emote SenS 60/pause 250/speak SenS "E-Er, oh right. I dove myself into hiding to plot my grand escape!$h#$b#Um... you see how well that went.$8"/speak Mateo "Well, if you're interested in learning to step into shadows, do let me know... I've got more than a few tricks up my sleeve.$79"/jump SenS 5 true/emote SenS 16/speak SenS "Hm... what do you...?$6#$b#O-oh! You mean that stunt you pulled back in the mines!$u#$b#Er- Um- Not that I was intentionally watching! I walked in on it after visiting home...$8#$b#A-anyways! Really? You'd- You'd be willing to teach me such things? We hardly met but a moment ago!$7"/speak Mateo "I'd be happy to. Knowledge isn't meant to be hoarded, it's meant to be shared.$79#$b#Besides, it seems like we could both do with a few more friends here in the Valley.$81"/speak SenS "Well I'll have you know, I absorb knowledge like a sponge and you won't meet a friendlier fellow!$h#$b#Oh- Right! I guess I should give you this before I forget, @.$h"/advancedMove SenS false -1 0 2 10/waitForAllStationary/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame farmer 57/playSound pickUpItem/addTemporaryActor PressedCrocus 16 16 33 15 2 false/hideShadow PressedCrocus true/pause 2000/warp PressedCrocus 999 999/showFrame farmer 0/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 0/message "You've obtained Sen's Pressed Crocus! It was just too beautiful to let wilt away.$l"/pause 250/emote farmer 56/pause 250/speak Mateo "Now, I don't know about how Shadow Folk react to rain, but @ and I are soaked to the bone... how about we find somewhere dry for your first lesson?$51"/speak SenS "Oh, I know just the place! My cave is nice and dry with plenty of space.$7"/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 250/speak SenS "I'll just need to tidy up a little, I don't often have guests...$8"/message "You spent the evening with Mateo and Sen, sharpening your skills.
